article_list.title: React (JavaScript library)
article_list.desc: React (also known as React.js or ReactJS) is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library[3] for building user interfaces based on UI components. It is maintained by Meta (formerly Facebook) and a community of individual developers and companies....

article_list.title: Vue.js (commonly referred to as Vue; pronounced "view"
article_list.desc: an open-source model–view–viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.[10] It was created by Evan You, and is maintained by him and the rest of the active core team members...

article_list.title: Angular (web framework)
article_list.desc: Angular (commonly[citation needed] referred to as "Angular 2+")[4] is a TypeScript-based free and open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations. Angular is a complete rewrite from the same team that built AngularJS...
